title: Ticket #485: condor_rm/q argument inconsistency
description:
David Brodbeck reported on condor-users:

condor_q jdoe -constraint JobStatus==1 will show all idle jobs for jdoe

condor_rm jdoe -constraint JobStatus==1 will remove all idle jobs AND all jdoe jobs
remarks:
2009-Nov-30 12:11:11 by jfrey:
Rod Walker just reported being bitten by this.

2009-Dec-04 15:48:24 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_4_1-branch for 7.4.1. If condor_rm is given both a constraint and a username or job id, it exits with an error.
check_ins:

Now, it gives an error and removes nothing. Committer: Dan Bradley (By Jaime Frey )
